plot outline: Kamal Kishore and Kavita are married, manage a publication, and regularly meet with many others at a Coffee House run by John. Kamal tenders his resignation after an argument with his wife, and decides to expose political inefficiency and corruption. He is soon joined by Daniel and two of his friends, also patrons of the Coffee House, who set about exposing a corrupt businessman. Elderly Jarnail Singh, acting upon advise of Bhattacharya, decides to teach his greedy and selfish children a lesson, and also subsequently joins Kamal. In this manner the group gathers support to such an extent that they are invited to question politicians on live TV. Watch what impact this has on corrupt politicians who feel threatened by the change initiated by Kamal.
title: Coffee House
plot: A former editor decides to create awareness about political inefficiency and corruption.

Kamal Kishore and Kavita are married, manage a publication, and regularly meet with many others at a _Coffee House_ (qv) run by John. Kamal tenders his resignation after an argument with his wife, and decides to expose political inefficiency and corruption. He is soon joined by Daniel and two of his friends, also patrons of the _Coffee House_ (qv), who set about exposing a corrupt businessman. Elderly Jarnail Singh, acting upon advise of Bhattacharya, decides to teach his greedy and selfish children a lesson, and also subsequently joins Kamal. In this manner the group gathers support to such an extent that they are invited to question politicians on live TV. Watch what impact this has on corrupt politicians who feel threatened by the change initiated by Kamal.::rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)
